channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How President Trump is sparking a crypto revolution in America
item.description: Crypto exchange giant Coinbase is set to join the S&P 500 on Monday. It's the latest stunning development as Trump completely revamps the approach to ...

item.title: Trump DOJ changes to civil rights division spark mass exodus of attorneys
item.description: Current and former officials say the current effort amounts to the dismantling of the civil rights division and its traditional mission.

item.title: Button-sized eggs and teapot cities: A peek into the big, wide world of miniatures
item.description: The pandemic helped supercharge a niche craft into a fine arts movement. Now the scene is more detailed and thoughtful than ever before.

item.title: Where does your weather forecast come from?
item.description: Whether you get your forecast from an app on your phone, a website or a meteorologist on TV, most of the underlying information comes from the federal...

item.title: Trump threatened school funding in Maine. Here's how that money is used
item.description: Schools in Maine are in the middle of a political and legal battle between the Trump administration and Gov. Janet Mills. Key programs for the most vu...

item.title: 5/18: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Biden diagnosed with aggressive form of prostate cancer that has spread to his bones; The story of a California bridge famous for bungee jumping

item.title: Warsaw's liberal mayor narrowly wins Polish presidential vote
item.description: Rafal Trzaskowski is set to face conservative historian Karol Nawrocki in a second round run-off.

item.title: NIH scientists to be laid off, despite what RFK Jr. told Congress
item.description: "As far as I know, we have not fired any working scientists," RFK Jr. had told Congress.

item.title: Watch: Cat caught smuggling drugs into Costa Rica prison
item.description: The feline was found carrying 235.65g of marijuana and 67.76g of heroin, authorities say.

item.title: Liberal mayor Dan beats nationalist in tense race for Romanian presidency
item.description: Nicusor Dan fights off a strong challenge from a right-wing nationalist after months of political turbulence.

item.title: NJ Transit strike ends as engineers approve new deal
item.description: NJ Transit and the Brotherhood of Locomotive Engineers and Trainmen reached a tentative deal Sunday that will end the strike.

item.title: Trump order targets barcodes on ballots. They’ve long been a source of misinformation
Housing, nutrition in peril as Trump pulls back Medicaid social services
item.description: About half of states have broadened Medicaid, the state-federal low-income health care program, to pay for social services such as housing and nutriti...

item.title: 'A pain I can't describe': Tornadoes sweep multiple US states
item.description: Dozens of people have died in parts of the United States after tornadoes caused catastrophic damage across the weekend.

item.title: Security consultant who worked for U.S. killed in cartel ambush
item.description: César Guzman was dining with two colleagues when gunmen opened fire, according to a retired FBI agent who worked with Guzman.

item.title: Kenya's ex-justice minister 'deported' from Tanzania
item.description: Karua was allowed into Tanzania last month but was stopped ahead of Tundu Lissu's latest court appearance.

item.title: Turbulent waters may have contributed to Mexican tall ship’s crash into Brooklyn Bridge
item.description: Footage of a tall ship crashing into the Brooklyn Bridge shows the vessel hurtling into the span in reverse at full speed, suggesting the captain lost...

item.title: Reward increased for capture of escaped New Orleans inmates as 7 remain on the lam
